segments.template: {{ .HEAD }}{{ if .BranchStatus }} {{ .BranchStatus }}{{ end }} ({{ if or (gt .Working.Untracked 0) (gt .Staging.Added 0) }}{{ if gt .Working.Untracked 0 }}<#e74c3c>{{ .Working.Untracked }}</>{{ if gt .Staging.Added 0 }}/<#2ecc71>{{ .Staging.Added }}</>{{ end }}{{ else }}<#2ecc71>{{ .Staging.Added }}</>{{ end }} {{ end }}{{ if or (gt .Working.Modified 0) (gt .Staging.Modified 0) }}{{ if gt .Working.Modified 0 }}<#e74c3c>~{{ .Working.Modified }}</>{{ if gt .Staging.Modified 0 }}/<#2ecc71>{{ .Staging.Modified }}</>{{ end }}{{ else }}<#2ecc71>~{{ .Staging.Modified }}</>{{ end }} {{ end }}{{ if or (gt .Working.Deleted 0) (gt .Staging.Deleted 0) }}{{ if gt .Working.Deleted 0 }}<#e74c3c>{{ .Working.Deleted }}</>{{ if gt .Staging.Deleted 0 }}/<#2ecc71>{{ .Staging.Deleted }}</>{{ end }}{{ else }}<#2ecc71>{{ .Staging.Deleted }}</>{{ end }}{{ end }}{{ if gt .StashCount 0}}<#ff8c00>󰈿{{ .StashCount }}{{ end }})
